name: Minimized II
description: Minimized 2 is a direct continuation of the first part. A new experience in graphic minimalism!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or XP Processor: 1 GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Seven Processor: 1,5 Ghz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
